spec_data.Name: perl-Parallel-Scoreboard
spec_data.Description:
Parallel::Scoreboard is a pure-perl implementation of a process scoreboard.
By using the module it is easy to create a monitor for many worker process,
like the status module of the Apache HTTP server.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:59:59 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Scoreboard for monitoring status of many processes
